survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Sharing Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with ride-sharing apps, focusing on user experience, app features, and service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing apps?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify data collection.

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing apps have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
